name: Crazy Maestro
description:
Help the crazy maestro to conduct the orchestra without loosing any notes! Or he can be mad at you!
Many levels to enhance your music reading skills while enjoying a fun game.

* Three levels of difficulty
* 70+ levels including some very challenging ones
* Perfect for improving your music reading skills in both treble and bass clef
* Note naming available in American (ABCDEFG), German (ABCDEFH) and Latin (do-re-mi-fa-sol-la-si)
